svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div:
NVA Router VM
vm-hub-router
IP: 10.20.1.4
(IP Forwarding)

div.div:
• Hub VNet: Central connectivity hub
- Azure Bastion for secure SSH access
- NVA (Router VM) with IP forwarding
• Dev Spoke: Development environment
- Routes all traffic via Hub NVA
- Isolated from Prod spoke
• Prod Spoke: Production environment
- Routes all traffic via Hub NVA
- Isolated from Dev spoke
• All inter-spoke traffic goes through NVA
